problem_text_cn: 如图,四边形ABCD内接于⊙O,F是上一点,且=,连接CF并延长交AD的延长线于点E,连接AC．若∠ABC=110°,∠BAC=20°,则∠E的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the quadrilateral ABCD is inscribed in ⊙O, F is the previous vertex, and =, connect CF and extend the extended line of AD to vertex E, connect AC. If ∠ABC = N_0, ∠BAC = N_1, then the degree of ∠E is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查的是圆内接四边形的性质,熟知圆内接四边形的对角互补是解答此题的关键．也考查了圆心角、弧、弦的关系．
